timeline.message: api object, ddl, and start of dao.

timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We could cache the addedOn and use the same for all the items in the batch (e.g. for debugging)
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: Let add a test for this particular egde case (e.g. valid json array: [null, "123"]) and maybe improve the error message.
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We could check that the current updated on is after the start updatedOn
timeline.author: marcomarasca

timeline.bodyText: We can avoid using guava, e.g. Arrays.asList()
timeline.author: marcomarasca

replies.bodyText: It is not the same.  The results of Arrays.asList() are "fixed-size".  If you try to add to the resulting list you get an UnsupportedOperationException.  Basically, the results are as limited as an actual array.
replies.author: john-hill

timeline.bodyText: You might want to add an explicit order by to avoid random future test failures
timeline.author: marcomarasca
